english.segment2: God has given us the ability, God has given us creativity, God has given us His authority, We will go forth,
english.segment3: Let us go forth with a vision, Let us go forth with dominion, Let us go forth with compassion, Let us go forth,
english.segment4: God has given us the ability, God has given us creativity, God has given us His authority, We will go forth,
english.segment5: Let us go forth with a vision, Let us go forth with dominion, Let us go forth with compassion, Let us go forth,
english.segment6: No we wont turn our blind eye to our brothers in need, We will serve with compassion so the whole world we see, We will now see your power and the whole world we know, Were revealing your kingdom but they wont know until we go,
english.segment8: No we wont turn our blind eye to our brothers in need, We will serve with compassion so the whole world we see, We will now see your power and the whole world we know, Were revealing your kingdom but they wont know until we go.
